definition: Mind your own business!/Don't interfere!
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
young
variant of 管[guan3]
surname Guan

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

idle/unoccupied/leisure

sentences.english: Monkey, seeing that the boy was actually a demon in disguise, told his master not to bother.
sentences.chinese: 悟空认出那是妖怪变的，叫师父少管闲事。

sentences.english: I will thank you to mind your business .
“You should mind your own fucking business, ” Basia yelled.
sentences.chinese: “你他妈的少管闲事，”巴士雅嚷道。

sentences.english: Mind your business, don't hurt her, you fool.
sentences.chinese: 少管闲事，别伤害她了，傻瓜。
